text: Avarkal yavaraiyum onru cerkkum (marumai) nalil, avan (jinkalai nokki)"o! Jinkalin kuttattare! Ninkal manitarkalil anekarai (valiketuttu) unkalutan certtuk kontirkalallava?" Enru ketpan. Atarku manitarkaliliruntu avarkalutaiya nanparkal; "enkal iraiva! Enkalil cilar cilaraikkontu palan ataintirukkinrom. Ni enkalukku nirnayitta tavanaiyai nankal ataintu vittom" enru kuruvarkal; atarku avan, "narakam tan ninkal tankumitamakum - allah natinalanri ninkal atil enrenrum iruppirkal - niccayamaka umatu iraivan mikka nanamutaiyonakavum, (yavarraiyum) nankarintavanakavum irukkinran
